content: toe-up tabi socks also known as split-toe or thong socks are worked from the toe up using the turkish co and finished with a short-row heel the size is fully adjustable for a perfect fit video links for all techniques used are included **techniques used** - turkish cast-on - kitchener stitch/grafting between toes - twin-stitch short-row heel - elizabeth zimmermann s sewn bind-off or an alternative of your choice - increase decrease
